Stem: Dark bluish-green, cylindrical, fleshy, branching. Covered in white 1 cm long spines.
Leaves: Up to 1 cm long. Short lived.
Flowers: Pink or red, up to 6 cm across. Cup-shaped.
FruitSeeds: Deep green or greenish-yellow egg to urn-shaped, up to 4.5 cm long.
DistinguishingFeatures: Can be very similar to Eve's needle cactus (*Austrocylindropuntia subulata*) but is generally smaller with shorter spines. It may also be mistaken for other cacti.
